thread.title: NYC local - quick 2 night visit - best hotel in Manhattan BY FAR!
thread.title_full: NYC local - quick 2 night visit - best hotel in Manhattan BY FAR! - Review of The Marmara Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Thomas D
title: NYC local - quick 2 night visit - best hotel in Manhattan BY FAR!
text:
This hotel is amazing and I don't know where to start. I was really impressed with the 2 computers available for the guests and the freedom to use them without hassle and also you are able to easily print. If you know Manhattan, you know that it can be a HUGE nightmare to find a public computer to use for free and to print. I got the smallest suite but it was still almost bigger than my apartment. I had a wonderful view! Everyone that works at the desk is awesome. John and Sam were very nice and helpful and so were the ladies at the desk. I will be coming back!
Room Tip: corner rooms are amazing! See more room tips
